data.title: Exclusive Booking Agency for Gabi Sklar
data.meta_description: Gabi Sklar is represented by Matt Adler at Wasserman Music.
data.text:
Gabi Sklar is a 24 year old singer/songwriter from New York. Gabi is produced by Grammy Award winning multi platinum producer Tommy Brown at Champagne Therapy Music Group. She has worked with songwriters Diane Warren, Isabella Sjostrand, Lara Andersson, Sam Romans, LionChild, Njomza, Boy Matthews, and 8ae. Her single "Pardon My French" has over 4M streams on Spotify and is on Spotify Fresh Finds Pop 2023 Playlist. Her single off her "Heartbreak In Heaven" EP has been featured on Spotify's New Music Friday, Chill Pop, Fresh Finds, Amazon Music New Music Friday and VEVO Incoming Pop Playlists. More

Gabi Sklar is a 24 year old singer/songwriter from New York. Gabi is produced by Grammy Award winning multi platinum producer Tommy Brown at Champagne Therapy Music Group. She has worked with songwriters Diane Warren, Isabella Sjostrand, Lara Andersson, Sam Romans, LionChild, Njomza, Boy Matthews, and 8ae. Her single "Pardon My French" has over 4M streams on Spotify and is on Spotify Fresh Finds Pop 2023 Playlist. Her single off her "Heartbreak In Heaven" EP has been featured on Spotify's New Music Friday, Chill Pop, Fresh Finds, Amazon Music New Music Friday and VEVO Incoming Pop Playlists. She also actively trains with vocal coach Don Lawrence (Lady Gaga, Mark Ronson) and Choreographer Laurie Ann Gibson (Lady Gaga) and performance coach, KJ Rose (Lil Nas X). Gabi posts daily music content on her TikTok account, which has amassed over 3.8 million followers; her videos have been liked over 67 million times. Gabi Sklar also has 1.3 Million Instagram Followers and 760k YouTube Followers. She has been featured on KCal CBS News, Rolling Stone, Pop Sugar, Just Jared and Perez Hilton. Gabi is a Sony Electronics Ambassador & Zyrtec Ambassador.
